summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Mary E. Erdoes, and Jes Staley discussing plans for a meeting in Seattle. The email indicates that Epstein is providing advice on reviewing plans for the meeting, and it contains a confidentiality notice suggesting the communication may be privileged.

persons.name: Mary E. Erdoes
persons.context: Mary E. Erdoes is involved in a discussion regarding plans for a meeting in Seattle.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is included in the email conversation about the Seattle meeting plans.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, providing advice on the meeting plans.

connections.description: Epstein appears to be in a position of authority or influence over Erdoes, as he is providing advice regarding meeting plans.
Epstein is communicating with Staley regarding plans, indicating a professional relationship.
Both Erdoes and Staley are included in the same email thread discussing meeting plans.

keyFacts: The email was sent on September 22, 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein advises on reviewing plans for a meeting in Seattle.
The communication contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be privileged.
Mary E. Erdoes and Jes Staley are included in the email conversation.
The email suggests that Epstein is in Rome at the time of sending.
